snippet.title: Space Boat - Official Trailer | Game Devs of Color Expo 2024
snippet.description: Play as a space cat detective, charged with finding a shapeshifting thief. Don your mech suit, talk to curious lifeforms, investigate a sprawling space cruiser, navigate secret areas in cat mode, and touch many things you probably shouldn't. Watch the Space Boat trailer to learn about this sci-fi world and your role in it as a space cat detective. Space Boat will be avaialble on Xbox, PlayStation, and Steam, and a demo is out now on those platforms.
